title: Raw HOFers and mid-tier backs FS
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Raw HOFers and mid-tier backs FS
posts.post_content:
Prices assume a no-fee payment method.

My scanner died, so I'm trying to make due with my phone camera.  If you'd like any more pics, just send me a message (include your email or phone number).

Huge Border George Davis GD $115 SOLD

Walsh GD/GD+ (there is a wrinkle at chin level that is hard to see in the first picture, also I imagine someone will ask if this card might be trimmed - I am certain it's not, and would buy it back if it ever graded an "A" if you send it in) $325 SOLD

Dougherty (high eye appeal, low technical grade) $52 SOLD

Konetchy glove high EPDG $120 SOLD

Quinn Cycle 350 FR $195 GONE

Mullin bat Tolstoi GD/GD+ $115 SOLD

Wagner EPDG $100

Tinker bat on shoulder Polar Bear $289

Tinker bat off shoulder Polar Bear $289
I will take Davis please. Thank You Joe
